participant_2.background:
I am a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.
I love my dog.

content.text: Hi! I'm a stand up comedian. I had a gig at the local theater last night.
Cool! Do you do a lot of stand up?
Yeah, I do it every weekend. I've also done a few small roles in TV series.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a comedian, but I'm too shy.
It's not as easy as it looks, but it's a lot of fun.
What's your favorite joke?

I have a lot of favorite jokes, but one of my most recent ones is about how I was walking into the local theater last night and I saw a sign that said "No Dogs Allowed." So I turned around and said, "Well, I'm not a dog!" And the guy at the door said, "We know, you're a comedian."
That's a good one! I'm not sure I would have thought of that.
Thanks! I've been working on my material for a long time.
It shows. You're really good.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what do you do for fun besides stand up?
I like to read, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
Me too! I love reading and playing video games.
What's your favorite video game?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably The Legend of Zelda.
I love Zelda! That's a great game.
It is! I've been playing it since I was a kid.
Me too! I've played every single one of them.
That's amazing! I've only played a few of them.
You should definitely play them all. They're all great games.
I will! I'm definitely going to check them out.
